changes: MAJOR: Replaced ZXing with Quagga2 barcode scanner library - now supports scanning barcodes at ANY rotation angle (0째, 90째, 180째, 270째)
Wine bottles with rotated barcodes can now be scanned in portrait mode without rotating the phone
Improved barcode detection accuracy and performance on mobile devices
Added support for multiple barcode formats: EAN-13, EAN-8, UPC-A, UPC-E, Code 128, Code 39, Codabar, and Interleaved 2 of 5
Enhanced scanning with multi-worker processing for faster detection
Added debounce protection to prevent duplicate scans within 1 second
(Previous) Added Filtering (Filtered / Unfiltered) field to Beer type
(Previous) Added new Beer item type (style, color, ABV, IBU, brewery, country, region)
(Previous) Disabled side menu / filter edge swipe gestures while modals are open
